com.ge.predix.mobile.core

Class UAAConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ge.predix.mobile.core.UAAConfiguration

  • public class UAAConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages what options an authentication session can have when the user is being authenticated.

    • Field Detail

      • allowBiometricAuthentication

        public boolean allowBiometricAuthentication
        Indicates whether biometrics can be used for subsequent authentications. Initial grants must be done implicitly by the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UAAConfiguration

        public UAAConfiguration(java.net.URI authenticationHost)
        Constructs an instance of an UAABrowserAuthenticationConfiguration. This UAABrowserAuthenticationConfiguration can be given to the UAAAuthenticationBase to configure how the authentication flow should be executed.
        Parameters:
        authenticationHost - The URI to send the browser to start the web based authentication flow

    • Method Detail

      • defaultConfiguration

        public static UAAConfiguration defaultConfiguration()
                                             throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a UAAConfiguration that is set with the UAA host endpoint from the properties.config file.
        Returns:
        A default UAA configuration with properties set from a configuration file.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the UAA url in the configuration is not a valid URI.

      • getAuthenticationHost

        public java.net.URI getAuthenticationHost()
        The set authentication URI to use for web authentication
        Returns:
        The set authentication URI
